self.name: snmptrap-collector
self.description: Collector for receiving SNMP traps and publishing to DMAAP/MR

parameters.name: snmptrap.version
parameters.description: version number

parameters.name: snmptrap.title
parameters.description: title for logging

parameters.name: protocols.transport
parameters.description: protocol used to transport trap (udp|tcp)

parameters.name: protocols.ipv4_interface
parameters.description: ipv4 address trap receiver should listen to (0.0.0.0 -> all)

parameters.name: protocols.ipv4_port
parameters.description: port trap receiver should bind to for ipv4 traps

parameters.name: protocols.ipv6_interface
parameters.description: ipv6 address trap receiver should listen to (::1 -> all)

parameters.name: protocols.ipv6_port
parameters.description: port trap receiver should bind to for ipv6 traps

parameters.name: cache.dns_cache_ttl_seconds
parameters.description: number of seconds snmptrapd will cache dns entry before re-loading it

parameters.name: publisher.http_timeout_milliseconds
parameters.description: milliseconds snmptrapd will wait for MR to respond to publish attempt

parameters.name: publisher.http_retries
parameters.description: number of times snmptrapd will re-attempt MR publish before moving on

parameters.name: publisher.http_milliseconds_between_retries
parameters.description: milliseconds snmptrapd will wait between MR publish re-attempts

parameters.name: publisher.http_primary_publisher
parameters.description: future use (resiliency)

parameters.name: publisher.http_peer_publisher
parameters.description: future use (resiliency)

parameters.name: publisher.max_traps_between_publishes
parameters.description: max number of traps snmptrapd will queue before publishing

parameters.name: publisher.max_milliseconds_between_publishes
parameters.description: max number of milliseconds snmptrapd will accumulate traps before publishing

parameters.name: files.runtime_base_dir
parameters.description: base dir of snmptrapd install

parameters.name: files.log_dir
parameters.description: location from runtime_base_dir for logs

parameters.name: files.data_dir
parameters.description: location from runtime_base_dir for data

parameters.name: files.pid_dir
parameters.description: location from runtime_base_dir for pid_dir

parameters.name: files.arriving_traps_log
parameters.description: log of all arriving traps (published or not)

parameters.name: files.snmptrapd_diag
parameters.description: future use

parameters.name: files.traps_stats_log
parameters.description: future use

parameters.name: files.perm_status_file
parameters.description: future use

parameters.name: files.eelf_base_dir
parameters.description: directory that all EELF format logs will be written to

parameters.name: files.eelf_error
parameters.description: EELF error log

parameters.name: files.eelf_debug
parameters.description: EELF debug log

parameters.name: files.eelf_audit
parameters.description: EELF audit log

parameters.name: files.eelf_metrics
parameters.description: EELF metrics log

parameters.name: files.roll_frequency
parameters.description: how often snmptrapd will roll logs to <logfilename>.timestamp, and start a new one

parameters.name: files.minimum_severity_to_log
parameters.description: minimium severity to log in above EELF log files: SEV_DETAILED=1, SEV_INFO=2, SEV_WARN=3, SEV_CRIT=4, SEV_FATAL=5

parameters.name: trap_def.1.trap_oid
parameters.description: oid 1 of interest

parameters.name: trap_def.1.trap_category
parameters.description: topic to publish oid 1 to (future use)

parameters.name: trap_def.2.trap_oid
parameters.description: oid 1 of interest

parameters.name: trap_def.2.trap_category
parameters.description: topic to publish oid 1 to (future use)

parameters.name: stormwatch.1.stormwatch_oid
parameters.description: stormWatch candidate oid 1

parameters.name: stormwatch.1.low_water_rearm_per_minute
parameters.description: stormWatch candidate oid 1 low-water rearm value (future use)

parameters.name: stormwatch.1.high_water_arm_per_minute
parameters.description: stormWatch candidate oid 1 high-water storm activation value (future use)

parameters.name: stormwatch.2.stormwatch_oid
parameters.description: stormWatch candidate oid 2

parameters.name: stormwatch.2.low_water_rearm_per_minute
parameters.description: stormWatch candidate oid 2 low-water rearm value (future use)

parameters.name: stormwatch.2.high_water_arm_per_minute
parameters.description: stormWatch candidate oid 2 high-water storm activation value (future use)

parameters.name: stormwatch.3.stormwatch_oid
parameters.description: stormWatch candidate oid 3

parameters.name: stormwatch.3.low_water_rearm_per_minute
parameters.description: stormWatch candidate oid 3 low-water rearm value (future use)

parameters.name: stormwatch.3.high_water_arm_per_minute
parameters.description: stormWatch candidate oid 3 high-water storm activation value (future use)
